abstract: The private equity firm run by the billionaire investor Tom Gores said Robert Klap would join the firm as a principle, playing an important role in investor relations and capital raising in Europe.

lead_paragraph: Platinum Equity, the Los Angeles private equity firm run by the billionaire investor Tom Gores, said on Thursday that Robert Klap would join the company as a principal.

headline.main: Robert Klap to Join Platinum Equity
